"A.P.241/9/23/10:00":
"It's been a while since we've last seen each other.
...You look a little tense. Are you alright?"

"Don't worry about it! We've been preparing
for a long time to welcome you back!"
"Well, it's kind of hard to not get nervous about something like this."

"But rest fully assured! I'll support
you both to the best of my abilities!"

"<%me>. Matoi.
This... is a strategic operation to save [Persona]."
